long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension hides noise in comments section on Designer News. It lets you see only one type of reaction e.g. best or worstâ€”so that you can move on with your busy designer life. Made with love by @robinraszka in NYC.
